name: Strongman Rush 3D
description:
Strongman Rush 3D is the ultimate muscle-building game! As the player, you must drag items using a rope attached to you, gaining energy to work out and build muscle. As you grow stronger, you can drag bigger items, and even move blockages to advance to the next room. With challenging levels and addictive gameplay, Strongman Rush 3D is perfect for anyone looking to test their strength and skills. Start your journey to becoming the ultimate strongman now!

Features:

Addictive gameplay with challenging levels
Drag items and gain energy to build muscle
Move blockages to advance to the next room
Grow bigger and stronger as you progress
Stunning 3D graphics and effects
Perfect for anyone looking to test their strength and skills
